1 Technical Data

 

 

microEnable IV
PixelPlant PX100

microEnable IV
PixelPlant PX200

microEnable IV
PixelPlant PX200e

Bandwidth (max.)

1 Gbyte/s per direction

 1 Gbyte/s per direction 1 Gbyte/s per direction

On-board memory

2 x128 Mbyte

 4 x 128 Mbyte 4 x 128 Mbyte

On-board FPGA processing

yes

 yes yes

FPGA logical gate capacity

1,600 K gates

 4,000 K gates 4,000 K gates

Voltage, max. Current
(actual values dependant on processing)

+3.3V, 30 mA
+12V, 300 mA

 +3.3V, 30 mA
+12V, 550 mA 		+3.3V, 30 mA
+12V, 550 mA

Dimensions

118.1 mm lenght x 95.2 mm height

 103.5 mm lenght x 80.6 mm height 103.5 mm lenght x 80.6 mm height

Weight

48 g
(+ 8 g for mounting parts)

 67 g
(+10 g for mounting parts)		 82 g
(+12 g for mounting parts)

Compatible Frame Grabber

mE4 VD1-CL, mE4 VD4-CL/-PoCL,

 mE4 VD1-CL, mE4 VD4-CL/-PoCL,
 all mE4 V-Series frame grabber
(2-slot solution)

Note: The usage of PixelPlant modules in conjunction with a certain microEnable IV V-Series frame grabber requires individual cooling arrangements to reach the defined operating temperature. Please contact SiliconSoftware technical support for detailed information: mailto:support@silicon-software.de




2 External Connectors

 

 

 

Connector

Type

Function

PX-IF

Samtec QTE-060-03-L-D-A

Connector to microEnable IV.

TRIGGER

34 Pin Flat Cable Connector

Connector to Trigger Extension (16 I/Os).

5 Pin Configuration Trigger

 

1 Trigger Output 0 Port A
Flash Signal		 +3.3V 2
3 Trigger Output 1 Port A
For Area Cameras: Image Trigger (ExSync)
For Line Cameras: Line Trigger (ExSync2)		 +3.3V 4
5 Trigger Output 2 Port A
For Area Cameras: HD Sync
For Line Cameras: Line Trigger (ExSync)		 GND 6
7 Trigger Output 3 Port A
User Output (Digital Out Bit #0)		 GND 8
9 Trigger Input 0 Port A GND 10
11 Trigger Input 1 Port A GND 12
13 Trigger Input 2 Port A GND 14
15 Trigger Input 3 Port A GND 16
17 Trigger Output 4 Port B
Flash Signal		 GND 18
19

Trigger Output 5 Port B
For Area Cameras: Image Trigger (ExSync)
For Line Cameras: Line Trigger (ExSync2)

 GND 20
21 Trigger Output 6 Port B
For Area Cameras: HD Sync
For Line Cameras: Line Trigger (ExSync)		 GND 22
23 Trigger Output 7 Port B
User Output (Digital Out Bit #1)		 GND 24
19 Trigger Input 4 Port B GND 26
21 Trigger Input 5 Port B GND 28
29 Trigger Input 6 Port B GND 30
31 Trigger Input 7 Port B VCCIO (+2.5V) 32
33 Presence Detect VCCIO (+2.5V) 34

 

Plug assignment of the trigger plug (34 pin flat cable).

2.5V logic level signals (LVCMOS25).

Signals are driven by open-collector drivers, pullups are on-board.
